---
title: "verify"
---

This command checks whether a given ELIspot configuration meets all of the following criteria:

1. Each peptide is represented in `--num-coverage` number of different pools.
2. Each peptide belongs to exactly one unique combination of pool IDs.

If an ELIspot configuration meets the above criteria, then we know exactly which peptide is a positive hit peptide when 
`--num-coverage` number of pools have positive spot counts.

```bash
usage: ace verify [-h] 
    --configuration-csv-file CONFIGURATION_CSV_FILE 
    --num-coverage NUM_COVERAGE
```

| Required Parameter          | Description                                                                               |
| --------------------------- | ----------------------------------------------------------------------------------------- |
| `--configuration-csv-file`  | ELIspot configuration CSV file. Expected columns: 'coverage_id', 'pool_id', 'peptide_id'. |
| `--num-coverage`            | Total coverage (i.e. number of peptide replicates).                                       |
